original_text: Now when Jesus came into the district of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, “Who do people say that the Son of Man is?”
korean_text: 예수께서 빌립보 가이사랴 지방에 이르러 제자들에게 물어 이르시되 사람들이 인자를 누구라 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Now when Jesus came into the district of Caesarea Philippi
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 가이사랴 빌립보 지방에 도착하셨을 때에

sentences.original_text: Who do people say that the Son of Man is?
